title: The Overtaking
description: Shayne believes he's living the ideal life.He attends a great school in the Midwest, gets along with his roommate, and has fallen for a girl who seems perfect for him.But it’s all a lie. And Shayne starts to figure it out.Danielle didn’t mean to fall in love with one of the Maslonians. She was only supposed to observe and report. But now she must choose to help Shayne...or betray him. This book is 59,000 words, 288 pages in paperback.From New York Times bestselling author of NOT WHAT SHE SEEMS.
author: Victorine E. Lieske
